item.title: ‘Quordle’ Hints And Answers For Saturday, August 23
item.description: Looking for some help with today’s Quordle words? Some hints and the answers are right here to give you a hand.

item.title: Pete Parsons Is Out At Bungie After Studio Turmoil, But Is That Why?
item.description: Was Pete Parsons kicked out of Bungie by Sony after the studio's decline in recent years? Almost certainly no, he was not.

item.title: Artificial Intelligence and the Next Great Transformation
item.description: We are entering the fourth era, the age of artificial intelligence. Artificial intelligence will drive global augmentation, collaboration, and disrupt...

item.title: This 1-Minute Ritual Can Transform Your Relationship, By A Psychologist
item.description: Just one small daily ritual can powerfully rewire not just your relationship with your partner but also your own capacity to give and receive love.

item.title: ‘Peacemaker’ Season 2 Literally Erases Zack Snyder’s Justice League
item.description: We now have our answer as to how Peacemaker will join the DCU, and it's about the funniest way it could have happened.
